title: Florida Teachers Are Emptying Classroom Libraries to Avoid Going to Jail
description: A new statewide policy is telling teachers to cover or remove books from shelves until they are reviewed—or potentially face felony charges.
author: Claire Woodcock, Janus Rose

title: Trump Promises to Go After Trans People if Re-Elected
description: His said his Department of Justice will investigate hospitals that treat transgender kids, and threatened schools that support trans students.
author: Anya Zoledziowski, chloe angyal
